recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish
recipes.instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside. In a separate pan, cook the pancetta until crispy. Whisk together the eggs and grated parmesan in a bowl. Add the hot pasta to the pancetta pan, remove from heat, and stir in the egg mixture quickly to create a creamy sauce.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: Rich chocolate cake with creamy frosting
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C. In a large bowl, mix the dry ingredients and then add the wet ones to form a smooth batter. Pour the batter into a greased baking pan and bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Let it cool before frosting.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Fresh salad with crispy croutons
recipes.instructions: In a large salad bowl, combine fresh lettuce, crispy croutons, grilled chicken, grated parmesan, and Caesar dressing. Toss everything well to coat evenly and serve immediately, chilled.

recipes.title: Beef Stew
recipes.description: Hearty beef stew with vegetables
recipes.instructions: In a large pot, brown the beef until seared on all sides. Add chopped carrots, potatoes, and onions. Pour in beef stock, bring to a boil, then reduce heat and let simmer for about 2 hours until the meat is tender and flavors are rich.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: Crispy sandwich with melted cheese
recipes.instructions: Butter the outer sides of the bread slices. Place cheese between the slices to form a sandwich. Heat a pan over medium heat and grill the sandwich on both sides until the bread is golden brown and the cheese has melted.

recipes.title: Tuna Salad
recipes.description: Simple and healthy tuna salad
recipes.instructions: Drain the tuna and place it in a bowl. Add chopped lettuce, corn, a drizzle of olive oil, and a splash of fresh lemon juice. Mix everything gently and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Mini Ham & Cheese Croissants
recipes.description: Flaky and golden puff pastry croissants filled with smoked ham and melted cheese.
recipes.instructions: Cut puff pastry into triangles, add ham and cheese, roll into croissants, brush with egg, sprinkle sesame seeds, and bake at 200°c (392°f) for 15 minutes..

recipes.title: Pasta Bolognese
recipes.description: Traditional Italian pasta with rich meat sauce
recipes.instructions: Cook beef and vegetables, add tomato sauce, simmer 45 min. Serve over spaghetti..

recipes.title: Tomato Soup
recipes.description: Creamy tomato soup with herbs
recipes.instructions: Simmer and blend until smooth..

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Classic pizza with tomato and mozzarella
recipes.instructions: Bake at 220°c for 15 minutes..

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes with syrup
recipes.instructions: Cook on hot griddle until golden..

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Homemade sushi with rice and fish
recipes.instructions: Roll and slice with sharp knife..

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.description: Sweet breakfast toast
recipes.instructions: Dip and fry slices until golden..

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh veggies with feta and olives
recipes.instructions: Mix and serve with olive oil..

recipes.title: Lentil Soup
recipes.description: Hearty soup with lentils and vegetables
recipes.instructions: Simmer until lentils are tender..

recipes.title: Baked Salmon
recipes.description: Oven-baked salmon with lemon
recipes.instructions: Bake at 180°c for 20 minutes..

recipes.title: Veggie Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick stir fry with mixed vegetables
recipes.instructions: Stir fry in wok for 10 minutes..

recipes.title: Apple Pie
recipes.description: Classic apple dessert with cinnamon
recipes.instructions: Bake at 190°c for 50 minutes..

recipes.title: Stuffed Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers stuffed with rice and meat
recipes.instructions: Bake covered for 40 minutes..

recipes.title: Smoothie Bowl
recipes.description: Colorful fruit smoothie with toppings
recipes.instructions: Blend and top with fruit & granola..

recipes.title: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.description: Quick and tasty fried rice with eggs
recipes.instructions: Stir fry all ingredients until heated through..

recipes.title: Lasagna
recipes.description: Layered pasta with meat and cheese
recipes.instructions: Layer and bake at 180°c for 45 minutes..

recipes.title: Focaccia with Tomatoes & Olives
recipes.description: Classic Italian focaccia topped with cherry tomatoes, black olives, olive oil, and herbs.
recipes.instructions: Mix and knead dough, let rise, press into pan. Top with olive oil, cherry tomatoes, olives, rosemary, and sea salt. Bake at 220°c for 25 minutes..

recipes.title: Chili Con Carne
recipes.description: Spicy stew with meat and beans
recipes.instructions: Simmer all ingredients for 1 hour..

recipes.title: Quiche Lorraine
recipes.description: Savory pie with cheese and bacon
recipes.instructions: Bake at 180°c for 35 minutes..

recipes.title: Fajitas
recipes.description: Grilled meat and vegetables in tortillas
recipes.instructions: Cook meat and veggies, serve in tortillas..

recipes.title: Seafood Pasta
recipes.description: A rich seafood pasta with linguine, shrimp, and mussels in white wine and garlic sauce.
recipes.instructions: Cook mussels and shrimp in olive oil, garlic, and white wine. Add cooked linguine and toss with parsley and chili flakes..

recipes.title: Blueberry Muffins
recipes.description: Moist muffins bursting with fresh blueberries.
recipes.instructions: Mix dry and wet ingredients separately, then combine and fold in blueberries. Bake at 180°c for 20 minutes..

recipes.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
recipes.description: Mushrooms filled with cheese and herbs
recipes.instructions: Bake filled mushrooms at 180°c for 15 minutes..

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy pasta with chicken
recipes.instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside. In a separate pan, cook the pancetta until crispy. Whisk together the eggs and grated parmesan in a bowl. Add the hot pasta to the pancetta pan, remove from heat, and stir in the egg mixture quickly to create a creamy sauce.

recipes.title: Strawberry Cheesecake
recipes.description: Creamy cheesecake with a fresh strawberry topping.
recipes.instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and sugar. In a separate bowl, combine the eggs, milk, and melted butter. Slowly pour the wet ingredients into the dry mixture while stirring continuously. Fold in the blueberries gently. Line a muffin tin with paper liners, spoon the batter into the cups, and bake at 180°C for 20–25 minutes or until golden brown and a toothpick comes out clean. Let them cool before serving.

recipes.title: Banana Bread
recipes.description: Moist and delicious banana bread.
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Wash and trim the mushrooms, removing the stems. In a bowl, mix the cream cheese with finely chopped garlic and parsley. Spoon the filling into each mushroom cap generously. Arrange them on a baking tray and bake for 15–18 minutes until golden and bubbling. Garnish with extra parsley and serve warm.

recipes.title: Lemon Bars
recipes.description: Tangy lemon filling over a buttery shortbread crust.
recipes.instructions: Cook the fettuccine in salted boiling water until al dente. In a pan, sauté chicken pieces in olive oil until browned and fully cooked. Add heavy cream and grated parmesan cheese, stirring until the sauce thickens. Combine the drained pasta with the sauce and toss gently. Serve hot with a sprinkle of freshly cracked black pepper.

recipes.title: Homemade Vanilla Ice Cream
recipes.description: Classic creamy vanilla ice cream made at home.
recipes.instructions: In a medium saucepan, bring the milk to a gentle simmer. Whisk in sugar, cocoa powder, and cornstarch until smooth. Stir continuously until the mixture thickens into a creamy pudding consistency. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract. Pour into small bowls and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Top with whipped cream or shaved chocolate before serving.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Soft and chewy cookies with chocolate chips.
recipes.instructions: In a blender, combine frozen bananas, strawberries, yogurt, and a splash of milk. Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour into a bowl and top with sliced fruits, granola, chia seeds, and a drizzle of honey. Serve immediately for a refreshing and nutritious breakfast.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Brownies
recipes.description: Rich brownies with a swirl of peanut butter.
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 190°C. Roll out the cookie dough and cut into shapes using your favorite cookie cutters. Place the cookies on a baking tray lined with parchment paper. Bake for 8–10 minutes or until the edges are golden. Let them cool completely before decorating with icing or sprinkles.

recipes.title: Carrot Muffins
recipes.description: Healthy and tasty carrot muffins.
recipes.instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente. Meanwhile, cook diced zucchini and bell peppers in a large skillet with olive oil until tender. Add cooked pasta to the vegetables and toss with pesto sauce. Garnish with grated parmesan and fresh basil before serving.

recipes.title: Nutella Crepes
recipes.description: Thin crepes filled with Nutella spread.
recipes.instructions: Whisk the eggs with salt and pepper. In a nonstick pan, cook the eggs gently, stirring with a spatula until they are soft and fluffy. Add cheese and allow it to melt slightly before folding. Serve warm with a side of toast or fresh vegetables.

recipes.title: Raspberry Parfait
recipes.description: Layered dessert with raspberries and cream.
recipes.instructions: In a food processor, blend frozen mango chunks, yogurt, honey, and a splash of lime juice until smooth and creamy. Transfer to a container and freeze for 2–3 hours. Scoop into bowls and serve as a refreshing treat on hot days.

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee and mascarpone.
recipes.instructions: Spread tomato sauce over pre-baked mini pizza crusts. Add slices of fresh mozzarella, pepperoni, and your favorite toppings. Bake in a preheated oven at 220°C for 12–15 minutes or until the cheese is bubbly and slightly golden. Garnish with basil before serving.

recipes.title: Creamy Chicken Pasta Bake
recipes.description: Hearty pasta bake with chicken, cheese, and cream sauce.
recipes.instructions: Cook penne in salted water until al dente. In a skillet, sauté chopped onion and garlic until fragrant. Add diced chicken and cook until golden. Stir in cream and half the cheddar, then mix with the pasta. Pour into a baking dish, top with remaining cheese, and bake at 180°C for 20–25 minutes until bubbly and golden.

recipes.title: Beef and Potato Casserole
recipes.description: Comforting casserole with ground beef, potatoes, and cheese.
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef with chopped onions in a skillet. In a saucepan, make a white sauce with butter, flour, and milk. In a greased baking dish, layer thinly sliced potatoes, beef, and sauce. Top with shredded cheddar and bake at 190°C for 45–50 minutes until golden and tender.

recipes.title: Spinach and Feta Puffs
recipes.description: Savory pastry bites with spinach and feta.
recipes.instructions: Soak chia seeds in milk and a splash of vanilla extract overnight in the fridge. In the morning, stir and layer the pudding in a glass with fresh fruit and granola. Serve chilled for a healthy and satisfying breakfast or snack.

recipes.title: Creamy Potato and Bacon Soup
recipes.description: Rich and comforting soup made with potatoes, crispy bacon, and cream.
recipes.instructions: Peel and dice the potatoes. In a large pot, cook chopped bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside. In the same pot, sauté chopped onion and garlic in the bacon fat and butter until soft. Add the potatoes and broth, bring to a boil, then simmer until the potatoes are tender. Blend part of the soup for a creamy texture, then stir in the cream and cooked bacon. Season with salt and pepper and serve hot.

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Chicken Thighs
recipes.description: Tender chicken thighs glazed with a sweet and savory sauce.
recipes.instructions: Mix honey, soy sauce, minced garlic, and ginger. Marinate chicken thighs in the mixture for 30 minutes. Sear in a hot skillet with oil until golden, then bake at 200°C for 25–30 minutes until cooked through and caramelized. Baste with extra sauce and serve hot.

recipes.title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
recipes.description: Creamy soup with fresh broccoli and melted cheddar cheese.
recipes.instructions: Sauté chopped onion and garlic. Add chopped broccoli and broth. Simmer until tender, then blend partially for a creamy texture. Stir in cream and cheddar cheese until melted. Season and serve warm.

recipes.title: Baked Ziti with Ricotta
recipes.description: Cheesy baked pasta with ricotta and tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Cook ziti until al dente. Mix with tomato sauce and ricotta cheese. Transfer to a baking dish, top with mozzarella and parmesan. Bake at 190°C for 25–30 minutes until bubbly and golden. Garnish with fresh basil before serving.

recipes.title: Spicy Sausage and Rice Casserole
recipes.description: Flavorful one-dish meal with sausage, rice, and peppers.
recipes.instructions: Cook sliced sausage until browned. Sauté chopped onions and peppers. Stir in rice, diced tomatoes, and spices. Add broth and bring to a boil. Cover and simmer until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed. Fluff and serve hot.

recipes.title: Cucumber Bites with Cream Cheese and Salmon
recipes.description: Refreshing cucumber snacks topped with cream cheese and smoked salmon.
recipes.instructions: Cut cucumber into thick slices and scoop out a small portion of the center. Mix cream cheese with a touch of lemon juice and chopped dill. Pipe or spoon the cheese mixture into the cucumber cups, then top with a small piece of smoked salmon. Garnish with extra dill and chill before serving as an elegant appetizer.

recipes.title: Cheesy Vegetable Casserole
recipes.description: Baked mix of vegetables topped with golden melted cheese.
recipes.instructions: Blanch vegetables until just tender. In a bowl, mix with cream and shredded cheddar. Pour into a baking dish, top with breadcrumbs and extra cheese. Bake at 180°C for 25–30 minutes until golden and bubbly.
